foreignData.name: Luxior, Giadas Geschenk
Luxior, don de Giada
ジアーダの贈り物、ラクシオール
foreignData.type: 伝説のアーティファクト — 装備品

foreignData.name: 吉娅妲赠礼仙光剑

name: Luxior, Giada's Gift

rulings.text: “Equip planeswalker” is a variant of the equip ability. “Equip planeswalker [cost]” means “[Cost]: Attach this permanent to target planeswalker you control as though that planeswalker were a creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”
Unless another effect is making that planeswalker a creature with a power and toughness, the equipped planeswalker has base power and toughness 0/0.
